main.java.com.easyinnova.tiff.reader

Class TiffReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.easyinnova.tiff.reader.TiffReader

  • public class TiffReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads and parses a Tiff file, storing it in an internal model.
